name: Gazi Tanbhir
summary: Computer Science graduate skilled in machine learning, Python, Django, and TensorFlow. Experienced in competitive programming (ICPC) and academic research with a strong technical foundation.

education.degree: B. Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering

work experience.title: Web Developer & Business Planner
responsibilities: Led the design and development of high-performance websites, improving functionality, responsiveness, and user experience.
Implemented strategic business planning to align web solutions with company objectives, increasing online engagement and sales.
Enhanced website performance and SEO, driving a significant boost in traffic and customer conversion rates.

work experience.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Designed and optimized WordPress websites, improving load speeds and user experience.
Implemented custom themes and plugins to enhance website functionality, resulting in increased user engagement.
Collaborated with content creators to develop SEO-friendly site structures, boosting search engine rankings.

publications.title: Hybrid Machine Learning Model for Detecting Bangla Smishing Text Using BERT and Character-Level CNN
publications.conference: 13th International Conference on Electrical and Computer Engineering (ICECE)

publications.title: Quantum-Inspired Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning Framework for Secure Dementia Classification
publications.conference: 4th International Conference on Electrical, Computer and Communication Engineering (ECCE)

publications.title: Enhancing Network Security: A Hybrid Approach for Detection and Mitigation of Distributed Denial-of-Service Attacks Using Machine Learning
PhishVQC: Optimizing Phishing URL Detection with Correlation Based Feature Selection and Variational Quantum Classifier

projects.name: LinkedIn Auto Apply Bot
projects.description: I developed an AI-powered automation tool that searches and applies for jobs on LinkedIn based on a given resume.

projects.name: Bengali Phising Text Detection System
projects.description: I designed a machine learning model to detect SMS phishing (smishing) using natural language processing (NLP) and transformers.

projects.name: Plant Disease Detection
projects.description: I built a convolutional neural network (CNN)-based system for detecting plant diseases using image processing.

projects.name: Fantasy Premier League (FPL) Leaderboard
projects.description: I developed a real-time Fantasy Premier League leaderboard that fetches live match data using the FPL API.

projects.name: Local AI Chatbot
projects.description: I developed a local AI chatbot capable of answering questions across various topics using DeepSeek and FastAPI. I integrated multiple AI and NLP frameworks to enhance response accuracy and efficiency.
